name: @layer0/shopify-hydrogen
description: Deploy Shopify Hydrogen apps to Layer0

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist; mkdir ./dist; cp -r package.json README.md default-app ./dist; tsc; cp -r stage/shopify-hydrogen/src/* dist; webpack
scripts.push-build: npm run build && cd dist && yalc push && cd ..
scripts.link: npm run build; cd dist; npm unlink; npm link
